product_name: Outdoor Research Growler Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its wicking nylon-blend fabric to keep you cool and looking sharp, the men's Growler Shirt from Outdoor Research is equally at home at the crag and around a patio fire pit. Lightweight plaid fabric wicks away moisture and dries fast so you stay comfortable. Front-button closure; 2 button-close chest pockets, 1 with a flap. Outdoor Research Growler Shirt features a curved hem and shoulder yoke set on the bias. Closeout.
short_description: With its wicking nylon-blend fabric to keep you cool and looking sharp, the men's Growler Shirt from Outdoor Research is equally at home at the crag and around a patio fire pit.
